description:
Montreal, April 13, 2015 - Trey Causey giving an overview of how to use GraphLab Create to quickly build scalable predictive models and deploy them to production using just an IPython notebook on a laptop.

* Trey Causey: @treycausey
* GraphLab Create: http://sflx.ca/glcreate
* MP53: http://sflx.ca/mp53e

Recorded and edited live by @ChristianAubry at Montréal-Python 53 (Sanctified Terabit) with a little help from Savoir-faire Linux (http://sflx.ca/jobs).
title: Scalable Machine Learning in Python using GraphLab Create
